articles.author: Herman Mostert
articles.title: 5 talking points | Proteas well-placed for World Cup semis, Aussies forget 'catches win matches'
articles.description: Herman Mostert highlights five talking points after South Africa's 134-run Cricket World Cup win over Australia in Lucknow, India.
articles.content:
Classy De Kock lays perfect foundation for Proteas
Proteas opener Quinton de Kock notched his second century in a row in the Cricket World Cup.
The classy left-hander's measured 109 off 106 balls l… [+77 chars]

articles.title: England and Essex legend Cook retires from cricket
articles.description: England and Essex legend Alastair Cook announces his retirement from professional cricket, ending a record-breaking 20-year career.
articles.content:
Alastair Cook ends his career with 26,643 runs from 352 first-class matches

articles.title: 'What a start!' - NZ's Boult takes wicket with first ball
articles.description: New Zealand bowler Trent Boult dismisses Bangladesh batter Liton Das with the first ball of their Cricket World Cup match in Chennai.
articles.content:
New Zealand bowler Trent Boult dismisses Bangladesh batter Liton Das with the first ball of their Cricket World Cup match in Chennai.

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
